articles.description: Off the coast of Australia, a ghostly apparition with long tentacles drifts through the deep.
articles.content:
The bigfin squid has tentacles that extend beyond 5 feet.
CSIRO/Osterhage et al.
At CNET Science, we tend to focus a lot on the worlds and life beyond Earth. We love space. The hellscape lava plane… [+3719 chars]

articles.author: Eric Mack
articles.title: Fireball-fueled Northern Taurid meteor shower peaks tonight. How to watch - CNET
articles.description: It's not the biggest of the year, but it can be among the most fiery.
articles.content:
A Taurid fireball captured in 2015. 
P. Spurny/Czech Academy of Sciences
One of the most explosive meteor showers of the year is just past its peak but still very active, which is good news if you'… [+2167 chars]
